trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> subelements inherit.
trans-unit.target: 表示抽象基底類別的所有實作<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>繼承子元素。

trans-unit.source: You can use KeyInfoClause objects to build a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> object for a specific digital signature or encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 KeyInfoClause 物件建置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>特定的數位簽章或加密的 XML 文件的物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> allows recipients of XML digital signatures and encrypted XML documents to determine which signing method and key values should be used for validation and decryption.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>允許 XML 數位簽章和加密的 XML 文件的收件的者，以判斷哪些簽章的方法和金鑰值應該用於驗證和解密。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> element and its subelements, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>項目和它的子元素，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，可用於在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ w3c，或請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 您無法建立抽象類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Application code creates a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼會建立衍生類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or encrypted XML `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>傳回由此方法適合用來做為子元素的 XMLDSIG 或加密的 XML 使用`<KeyInfo>`項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> to match.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會剖析輸入<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>及設定的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>要比對。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to process a subelement of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常用來處理的子元素`<KeyInfo>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>.
